mapper.select: select count(1) as totalOrderCount, count(case when status = 2 then 1 else null end) as paidOrderCount, count(case when status in (0, 1) then 1 else null end) as unpaidOrderCount, sum(amount) as totalOrderAmount, sum(case when status = 2 then amount else 0 end) as paidOrderAmount, sum(case when status in (0, 1) then amount else 0 end) as unpaidOrderAmount from df_recharge_order ${ew.customSqlSegment}
